description: You can use UpdateOutpostResolver to update the instance count, type, or name of a Resolver on an Outpost.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: A unique string that identifies Resolver on an Outpost.

nested_items.name: OutpostResolver
nested_items.description: The response to an UpdateOutpostResolver request.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) for the Resolver on an Outpost.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Outpost Resolver was created, in Unix time format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: ModificationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Outpost Resolver was modified, in Unix time format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: CreatorRequestId
nested_items.description: A unique string that identifies the request that created the Resolver endpoint. The CreatorRequestId allows failed requests to be retried without the risk of running the operation twice.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the Resolver on Outpost.

nested_items.name: InstanceCount
nested_items.description: Amazon EC2 instance count for the Resolver on the Outpost.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A detailed description of the Resolver.

nested_items.name: OutpostArn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) for the Outpost.
